subject: Basketball (College)
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Connecticut (20-1, 7-1 Big East) said the backup point guard Brianna Banks will miss the remainder of the season with a torn anterior cruciate ligament in her right leg.
snippet: Connecticut (20-1, 7-1 Big East) said the backup point guard Brianna Banks will miss the remainder of the season with a torn anterior cruciate ligament in her right leg.
